q: longer. In fact, a Chrysler 300 hybrid may be added to the company's portfolio within the next two years. X FACTOR boss Simon Cowell is trying to entice Britain's top voiceover man to America. Booming Peter Dickson, 49, is familiar to millions of fans for telling nervous contestants: It's time... to face... the music!
